original_text: So I did as I was commanded. During the day I brought out my things packed for exile. Then in the evening I dug through the wall with my hands. I took my belongings out at dusk, carrying them on my shoulders while they watched.
korean_text: 내가 그 명령대로 행하여 낮에 나의 행장을 끌려가는 포로의 행장 같이 내놓고 저물 때에 내 손으로 성벽을 뚫고 캄캄할 때에 행장을 내다가 그들의 목전에서 어깨에 메고 나가니라

sentences.original_text: So I did as I was commanded
During the day I brought out my things
sentences.korean_translation: 낮 동안 나는 내 물건들을 가지고 나왔다

sentences.original_text: Then in the evening I dug through the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 저녁에 나는 벽을 뚫었다

sentences.original_text: I took my belongings out at dusk
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 소지품을 해질녘에 가지고 나왔다
